name: Dark Breath+
description: After this unit attacks, foes within 2 spaces of target suffer Atk/Spd-5 through their next actions.

refinable.description: After combat, if unit attacked, inflicts Atk/Spd-7 on target and foes within 2 spaces of target through their next actions. If foe's Range = 2, damage calculated using the lower of foe's Def or Res.
